name: Lloyd, Sasha, and 7 Cheating Partners
description:
Lloyd returns to the village where he was born and raised after being transferred for the first time in five years.
There, he meets and meets five women again.

Yurika, the former girlfriend and now someone else's wife
Aunt Nina, my father's younger sister and my partner
My first love, Alicia, who works at a grocery store
Sister Clarisse who came to work while Lloyd was away from the village.
Warrior Noel who exterminates monsters as a colleague

Lloyd cheated on me
But things don't go so well in the world
He will be rewarded for his deeds...
